import React from 'react' function MenuItem ({product, AddHandler}) { const { id, name, description, price } = product; return (
  • {id}. {name}
    ${price}ea
    {description}
    AddHandler({id, name})} className='fa fa-plus text-success hover-spin'>
    • ) } export default MenuItem
